concept.title: Configuring a private master NTP server

conbody.p: requires a common time source. The following procedure configures a private master server to synchronize the system clocks of all hosts.
conbody.note: VMware vSphere guest systems can synchronize their system clocks with the host system. If that feature is enabled, it must be disabled to configure a private master NTP server. For more information, refer to the VMware documentation for your version of vSphere.
